tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE LectureSlides (lecture_id INT, title VARCHAR(255), content TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (lecture_id));
CREATE TABLE Videos (video_id INT, title VARCHAR(255), url VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (video_id));
CREATE TABLE Quizzes (quiz_id INT, title VARCHAR(255), questions JSONB, PRIMARY KEY (quiz_id));

CREATE TABLE videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id UUID,
    video_title TEXT,
    video_file BYTEA,
    video_duration INT
);
